question: You recently heard about an international company that you would like to work for. Write a job application letter and say:How did you hear about the company?What skills and qualification do you have?Why do you want to work there?
text: Hope my letter finds you well.

I am writing this letter to express my interest regarding in the job vacancy that you posted on LinkedIn. I am Ruth Acantilado, I have completed my bachelor's degree in accounting. Thus, I believe my skills and knowledge are suitable for the criteria that you are looking for.

Currently, I am working as an accountant in a construction company. I am assisting our Finance Director in the preparation of monthly financial reports for the management as well as suggesting some improvements for the internal department. I have leadership skills and I can work with less supervision. Moreover, I have advanced knowledge of Microsoft word and excel, therefore, I believe that I am most suitable for the job.

Kindly note that working in an international company is one of my biggest dreams. This is a great opportunity to expand my horizon and experience in terms of financial aspects from the big organization. I have some reasons, why I am interested in the job. Firstly, your employee benefits are very attempting such as health and flight benefits. Another reason is the salary that you offer is high and very competitive.

I appreciated it if you could consider my application. I have attached my resume for further details. Should you have any concerns regarding my application, please do not hesitate to contact me. I am available for an interview anytime.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
